department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) to obtain the services of a general contractor to carry out improvements in the accessibility of the client's spaces in order to make them compliant with accessibility. Full details of the requirement can be found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
===============

### Corporate Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**
---------------

WS4025358585-Doc4025370465

**Title**
-----

[French] Travaux de mise aux normes en accessibilité - EG236-232066
[English] Accessibility Upgrade Work - EG236-232066

**Tender Status**
---------------

This tender has elapsed and is no longer eligible for submission.

**Client Organization**
-------------------

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), [French] Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux
* Located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Canada

**Underlying Requirements**
-------------------------

The tender seeks to source specialized public construction services to enhance the accessibility of client spaces. The aim is to ensure that the spaces comply with applicable accessibility standards.

### Contact
---------------

[English]
* Name: Lüssier, Joël
* Email: joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Canada

**Important Documents**
-----------------------

This tender announcement is made under the auspices of the Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) of Canada. The solicitation documents, containing the complete set of specifications and requirements, will be issued only to qualified suppliers.

**Negotiation and Procurement Process**
-------------------------------------

Qualification and evaluation assessments will be carried out to ensure suitability for specific contract.
